the action should move to the next player
the pot should remain accurate

description:
As a poker platform administrator
  I want to ensure strict turn order enforcement with professional out-of-turn action rejection
  So that the game maintains integrity and follows official Texas Hold'em rules

elements.name: Strict Turn Order Validation in Preflop Betting

steps.name: the server is running on "http://localhost:3001"
I am in the game lobby
there is a test table "Turn Order Test Table" with 5 seats
I create test players "TurnPlayer1,TurnPlayer2,TurnPlayer3" with 500 chips each
all players join the test table and take seats "1,2,3"
the game starts with "TurnPlayer1" as dealer
the preflop betting round begins
"TurnPlayer3" should be first to act (left of big blind)
"TurnPlayer1" attempts to "call" out of turn
I should see turn order violation error "OUT OF TURN: It is currently TurnPlayer3's turn to act"
"TurnPlayer1" action should be rejected
the current player should still be "TurnPlayer3"

elements.name: Out-of-Turn Action Rejection with Professional Error Messages

steps.name: the server is running on "http://localhost:3001"
I am in the game lobby
there is a test table "Turn Order Test Table" with 5 seats
I create test players "OrderPlayer1,OrderPlayer2,OrderPlayer3,OrderPlayer4" with 400 chips each
all players join the test table and take seats "1,2,3,4"
the game starts with "OrderPlayer2" as dealer
the preflop betting round begins
"OrderPlayer4" should be first to act
"OrderPlayer1" attempts to "bet" with amount "50" out of turn
I should see turn order violation error "OUT OF TURN: It is currently OrderPlayer4's turn to act"
"OrderPlayer2" attempts to "raise" to "100" out of turn
I should see turn order violation error "OUT OF TURN: It is currently OrderPlayer4's turn to act"
"OrderPlayer3" attempts to "fold" out of turn
I should see turn order violation error "OUT OF TURN: It is currently OrderPlayer4's turn to act"
the current player should still be "OrderPlayer4"
no out-of-turn actions should have been processed

elements.name: Turn Order Enforcement During Flop Betting

steps.name: the server is running on "http://localhost:3001"
I am in the game lobby
there is a test table "Turn Order Test Table" with 5 seats
I create test players "FlopPlayer1,FlopPlayer2,FlopPlayer3" with 300 chips each
all players join the test table and take seats "1,2,3"
the game starts and completes preflop betting
the flop is dealt
the flop betting round begins
"FlopPlayer2" should be first to act (left of dealer)
"FlopPlayer3" attempts to "check" out of turn
I should see turn order violation error "OUT OF TURN: It is currently FlopPlayer2's turn to act"
"FlopPlayer1" attempts to "bet" with amount "30" out of turn
I should see turn order violation error "OUT OF TURN: It is currently FlopPlayer2's turn to act"
the current player should still be "FlopPlayer2"
the server is running on "http://localhost:3001"
I am in the game lobby
there is a test table "Turn Order Test Table" with 5 seats
I create test players "FoldPlayer1,FoldPlayer2,FoldPlayer3,FoldPlayer4" with 250 chips each
all players join the test table and take seats "1,2,3,4"
the game starts with "FoldPlayer1" as dealer
the preflop betting round begins
"FoldPlayer2" (first to act) performs "fold"
the turn should move to "FoldPlayer3"
"FoldPlayer2" attempts to "call" (after folding)
I should see turn order violation error "Cannot perform call: you have folded and are no longer active"
"FoldPlayer1" attempts to "raise" to "80" out of turn
I should see turn order violation error "OUT OF TURN: It is currently FoldPlayer3's turn to act"
the current player should still be "FoldPlayer3"

elements.name: Turn Order Enforcement with All-In Players

steps.name: the server is running on "http://localhost:3001"
I am in the game lobby
there is a test table "Turn Order Test Table" with 5 seats
I create test players "AllInPlayer1,AllInPlayer2,AllInPlayer3" with 100 chips each
all players join the test table and take seats "1,2,3"
the game starts with "AllInPlayer3" as dealer
the preflop betting round begins
"AllInPlayer2" (first to act) performs "allIn"
the turn should move to "AllInPlayer3"
"AllInPlayer2" attempts to "bet" after going all-in
I should see turn order violation error "Cannot perform bet: you have folded and are no longer active"
"AllInPlayer1" attempts to "call" out of turn
I should see turn order violation error "OUT OF TURN: It is currently AllInPlayer3's turn to act"
the server is running on "http://localhost:3001"
I am in the game lobby
there is a test table "Turn Order Test Table" with 5 seats
I create test players "ValidPlayer1,ValidPlayer2" with 200 chips each
all players join the test table and take seats "1,2"
the game starts with "ValidPlayer1" as dealer
the preflop betting round begins
"ValidPlayer2" (big blind) checks when they should call
I should see turn order violation error "Cannot check: there is a bet of 5 to call"
"ValidPlayer2" performs "call" correctly
the turn moves to "ValidPlayer1"
"ValidPlayer1" attempts to "call" when no bet exists
I should see turn order violation error "Cannot call: no bet to call. Use check instead"

elements.name: Turn Order During Multiple Betting Rounds

steps.name: the server is running on "http://localhost:3001"
I am in the game lobby
there is a test table "Turn Order Test Table" with 5 seats
I create test players "RoundPlayer1,RoundPlayer2,RoundPlayer3" with 500 chips each
all players join the test table and take seats "1,2,3"
the game progresses through preflop, flop, and turn phases
the river betting round begins
"RoundPlayer2" should be first to act (left of dealer)
"RoundPlayer3" attempts to "bet" with amount "100" out of turn
I should see turn order violation error "OUT OF TURN: It is currently RoundPlayer2's turn to act"
"RoundPlayer1" attempts to "check" out of turn
I should see turn order violation error "OUT OF TURN: It is currently RoundPlayer2's turn to act"
the current player should remain "RoundPlayer2"

elements.name: Turn Order Enforcement During Showdown Phase

steps.name: the server is running on "http://localhost:3001"
I am in the game lobby
there is a test table "Turn Order Test Table" with 5 seats
I create test players "ShowdownPlayer1,ShowdownPlayer2" with 300 chips each
all players join the test table and take seats "1,2"
the game reaches showdown phase
"ShowdownPlayer1" attempts to "bet" with amount "50"
I should see turn order violation error "Cannot perform bet: hand is showdown"
"ShowdownPlayer2" attempts to "fold"
I should see turn order violation error "Cannot perform fold: hand is showdown"

elements.name: Turn Order Validation Error Messages Include Player Names

steps.name: the server is running on "http://localhost:3001"
I am in the game lobby
there is a test table "Turn Order Test Table" with 5 seats
I create test players "NamedPlayer1,NamedPlayer2,NamedPlayer3" with 400 chips each
all players join the test table and take seats "1,2,3"
the game starts with "NamedPlayer2" as dealer
the preflop betting round begins
"NamedPlayer1" should be first to act
"NamedPlayer2" attempts to "call" out of turn
I should see turn order violation error containing "It is currently NamedPlayer1's turn to act"
"NamedPlayer3" attempts to "raise" to "75" out of turn
I should see turn order violation error containing "It is currently NamedPlayer1's turn to act"

elements.name: Turn Order Recovery After Invalid Attempts

steps.name: the server is running on "http://localhost:3001"
I am in the game lobby
there is a test table "Turn Order Test Table" with 5 seats
I create test players "RecoveryPlayer1,RecoveryPlayer2,RecoveryPlayer3" with 350 chips each
all players join the test table and take seats "1,2,3"
the game starts with "RecoveryPlayer1" as dealer
the preflop betting round begins
"RecoveryPlayer3" attempts multiple out-of-turn actions
all out-of-turn attempts should be rejected
the current player should remain "RecoveryPlayer2"
"RecoveryPlayer2" performs "call" correctly
the turn should properly advance to "RecoveryPlayer3"
the game should continue normally

name: Professional Turn Order Enforcement

description:
As a poker platform administrator
  I want a comprehensive user role management system with permissions and moderation
  So that I can properly manage users, enforce rules, and maintain platform security

elements.name: User Registration with Default Role Assignment
